ch0013_00_hapu/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Been a while, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You look different, like you’re ready
to go all out now!
ch0013_00_hapu/0101_0701_02_10:
I wonder what grand adventures await us today!
Come, it’s time for some fun!
ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_01_10:
You know, people speak in a most peculiar
fashion in this city! I noticed that on
other islands in Alola as well.
ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_02_10:
My own venerable grandfather is the only one
I had to emulate growing up, so I am not
familiar with your hip, groovy slang.
ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_04_10:
Well, either way, I have gotten used
to saying them now, and that’s not
likely to change.
ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0702_01_10:
Ho! Well met, friend! Such fine weather
we’re having today, don’t you think?
Wait, no, GROOVY weather, huh?!
ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0702_02_10:
*sigh* This is more difficult than I thought.
Perhaps big city slang and I were not
meant to mix!
ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_01_10:
The bond I share with my Mudsdale is not
merely that of Trainer and Pokémon!
ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_02_10:
He lets me ride on his back, of course, and
he carries heavy cargo. He lends us his
strength to plow the fields.
ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_03_10:
The farm would never survive without
Mudsdale’s help! Shoot, life on the island
just wouldn’t be the same without him!
ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_04_10:
My grandfather always used to say people and
Pokémon were made to help one another—
I really feel the truth of those words now!
ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0702_01_10:
There are some hurdles I can’t jump over alone,
but together, my Mudsdale and I can overcome
them all!
ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0702_02_10:
And before we know it, we are covered from
head to toe in mud! Two peas in a pod, we are!
ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_01_10:
There was this one time, before I
was the Island Kahuna...
ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_02_10:
I was taking a stroll along the beach when I felt
an odd squishy sensation under my toes—
I had accidentally stepped on a Gastrodon!
ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_03_10:
Some purple liquid was oozing out of it,
so I leaned down to see if it was hurt—and
it started healing itself right before my eyes!
ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0702_01_10:
The heartiness of that little Gastrodon
was truly a sight to behold, I tell you!
ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0702_02_10:
The texture of its gooey body and its cry
were so...edgy. Ahh, I’d love to
see one again.
ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_01_10:
Before I was chosen to be an island kahuna,
I journeyed throughout Alola to prove my worth
to the guardian deity, Tapu Fini.
ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_02_10:
And that got me thinking, what if I extend my
journey beyond the Alolan islands?
Around the world!
ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_03_10:
That is how I came to participate in
the PML here on Pasio.
ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0702_01_10:
I wonder how my grandmother and the others
are getting on back in Alola.
ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0702_02_10:
I will have a thousand stories to share
with them when I return home!
ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_01_10:
You are a truly devoted Trainer,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! There’s never a dull
moment when you’re around.
ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_02_10:
Sometimes, when we’re together, I feel as
though a hidden power deep inside
of me is awakening!
ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_03_10:
Hmm! Hapu’s hidden power.
Anything could Hapun!
ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_04_10:
Hmph! On second thought, forget what I
just said! It was not as punny as I thought.
ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_05_10:
It’ll be our little secret! 
Promise you won’t tell a soul!
ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0702_01_10:
Good puns have a way of sticking into
your memory like glue.
ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0702_02_10:
If you ever come up with a good one,
do share it with me!
ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh! You came at just the right time.
I was just thinking of giving you this!
ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0701_02_10:
Whenever I go out on strolls, I tend to
pick up new ideas and occasionally
some knickknacks!
ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0702_01_10:
Here, don’t be shy!
This is my way of saying thank you.
ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_01_10:
You never fail to surprise me when it comes
to Pokémon battling.
ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_02_10:
However, you are still but a rough-hewn stone.
As an island kahuna, I feel it is my duty
to guide you and polish you to greatness!
ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_03_10: What? Oh, I meant no offense, friend!
ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_04_10:
There is still much for me to learn
on my own journey as well!
We shall learn and grow together!
ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0702_01_10:
There is so much that we can still learn.
The world is an open book!
ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0702_02_10: The more you learn, the more you grow!
ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_01_10:
Hmm. There is still so much I do not
know about this place.
ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_02_10:
I did not come here for sightseeing,
but journeying around the world like this
is a remarkable experience, indeed!
ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_03_10:
Are you familiar with this area?
It would be grand if you could show
me around sometime.
ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_01_10:
I want to go back to my grandmother and
the rest of the family with plenty of
stories to tell!
ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_02_10:
If you happen across any extraordinary
tidbits, be sure to let me know!
ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_03_10:
My trust in your recommendations
is absolute!
ch0013_00_hapu/3001_0701_01_10:
Ah, you’re awake!
Having to tend to the fields every morning
has made me an early riser.
ch0013_00_hapu/3002_0701_01_10:
It is good to wake up early!
You should make the most of the time you have!
ch0013_00_hapu/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon, friend!
Now is the time to relax and take a stroll.
ch0013_00_hapu/3004_0701_01_10:
Alola!
This is how we greet people in my hometown.
ch0013_00_hapu/3005_0701_01_10:
On the island, things get quite sleepy
once the sun goes down. But I think I
can hold out a little longer today!
ch0013_00_hapu/3006_0701_01_10:
Good evening! I have heard that at night
the city never sleeps! But I am sleepy!
